roleset.name: adorable

example.name: arg1
example.text: Post a lousy photo , then bark around like a berserk dog , and then support yourself and exasperate 1.3 billion Chinese people , you American henchman are detestable to the point of *PRO* being a bit cute !

roleset.note: CUTE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from cute.01-j)
